translation.en: ♪ Come on to me ♪
Is she is okay?
She's gonna be okay?
No, no, no. Oh, God.
Our Father, who art in Heaven, hallowed be thy name.
translation.es: Padre nuestro que estás en los cielos, santificado sea tu nombre.

translation.en: Thy kingdom come, thy will be done, on Earth as--
translation.es: Venga a nosotros tu reino. Hágase tu voluntad…

translation.en: While you're at it, ask him why he always takes the kids,
translation.es: De paso, pregúntale por qué siempre se lleva a los chicos

translation.en: while the drunk fucks walk away with scratches.
translation.es: y salva a los putos borrachos.

translation.en: I find this recommendation very appropriate, Counsel.
And I ask, do you want me to proceed,
translation.es: ¿Quiere que proceda, o su cliente prefiere ir a juicio?

translation.en: or would your client prefer I set the matter for trial?
translation.es: o su cliente prefiere ir a juicio?

translation.en: I… I accept the sentencing, Your Honor.
It is the sentence of this court that you be incarcerated for 4- 10 years
translation.es: Irá a prisión por un período de cuatro a diez años

translation.en: in the custody of the Illinois Department of Corrections.
translation.es: bajo custodia del Correccional de Illinois.

translation.en: The restitution amount that is owed is $140,900.11 to the victim's family.
translation.es: La familia de la víctima recibirá una indemnización de $148 900.11.

translation.en: Your room is all ready.
- Who's picking you up? -
Okay, so get to the dock by 9:00,
translation.es: Está bien, ve al muelle antes de las 9:00.

translation.en: otherwise you'll miss the Breeze and you'll have to wait for the Belle.
translation.es: Si no, te perderás el Breeze y tendrás que esperar por el Belle.

translation.en: There's only two ferries these days.
He knows the boat schedule, Annie.
Hmm? No, he was just asking if you knew the boat schedule
translation.es: Él solo preguntaba si sabías los horarios.

translation.en: because he just can't wait to see you.
Do you need anything else? Clothes or shoes or anything?
translation.es: ¿Necesitas algo más? ¿Ropa, zapatos u otra cosa?

translation.en: They give it all back to you, right? What you went in with?
translation.es: ¿Recuperas lo que tenías al llegar ahí?

translation.en: The clothes and such?
- I'm goin' out. - Out where?
I'm meeting Ooker at the marina.
translation.es: Veo a Ooker en el puerto.

translation.en: What, so you're not gonna eat?
Do you wanna say hi to Dad?
Okay. Ed, Riley wants to say hi.
translation.es: Está bien. Ed, Riley quiere saludar.

translation.en: Honey, you know, your dad just stepped out,
translation.es: Cariño, tu papá acaba de salir.

translation.en: and so he didn't hear me, but he says hi.
translation.es: No me oyó, pero te envía saludos.

translation.en: Okay.
Okay. I love you and I will see you tomorrow.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Te quiero. Hasta mañana.

translation.en: Okay.
Now listen.
Miss Keane says that Ooker's been up to God- knows- what in the Uppards.
translation.es: La señorita Keane dice que Ooker estuvo en algo raro en Uppards.

translation.en: Miss Keane is crazy, Mom.
Well, I was 16 once and I know what goes on up there, so no Uppards.
translation.es: Yo tuve 16 años alguna vez y sé lo que pasa ahí. No vayas a Uppards.

translation.en: - No trouble, be back by curfew. - I know, Ma.
translation.es: - Sin líos, no vuelvas tarde. - Sí, mamá.

translation.en: And for Jesus' sake, Warren, no drinking.
translation.es: Y por Dios, Warren, no bebas.

translation.en: I promise.
Your brother comes home tomorrow.
That's great, Ma.
Good and truly.
Off you go.
♪ Soo, soolaimon ♪
♪ Lord of my need, need, need ♪
translation.es: IGLESIA CATÓLICA DE SAN PATRICIO FUNDADA EN 1824

translation.en: ♪ Leading me on, on, on ♪
translation.es: IGLESIA CATÓLICA DE SAN PATRICIO FUNDADA EN 1824 BIENVENIDO DE VUELTA, MONSEÑOR PRUITT MISA EL DOMINGO

translation.en: ♪ On to the woman, she dance for the sun ♪
translation.es: BIENVENIDO DE VUELTA, MONSEÑOR PRUITT MISA EL DOMINGO ALIMENTOS DE MAR O'CONNOR E HIJOS

translation.en: ♪ God of my day, day, day ♪
translation.es: ALIMENTOS DE MAR O'CONNOR E HIJOS

translation.en: ♪ Seek for the way, way, way ♪ ♪ Taking me home and she callin' ♪
- Hey, Flynn. - Hey.
Miss Keane says you've been up to no good in the Uppards, apparently.
translation.es: Keane dice que estuviste en cosas raras en Uppards.

translation.en: Oh. Her lips to God's ears.
No, her lips to my ass.
translation.es: No, que me bese el culo.

translation.en: - You seen him yet? - No, not yet.
Hey, guys!
Oh, shit.
- You didn't invite Aladdin, did you? - Come on. Give him a chance.
- What's up? - Hey, Ali.
- I'm surprised your dad let you out. - If I wanna go out, I go out.
translation.es: - ¿Tu papá te dejó salir? - Si quiero salir, salgo.

translation.en: There he is.
Don't wave the cash around. Jesus.
What?
Uh, he's cool.
- What if he narcs? -
- I wouldn't. - I don't know you.
translation.es: - No haría eso. - No te conozco.

translation.en: Come on, Bowl. He can't help who his dad is. We had a deal.
translation.es: Bol, no es su culpa quién sea su papá. Teníamos un trato.

translation.en: - He wasn't part of that deal. - He's got a point.
translation.es: - Él no era parte. - Tiene razón.

translation.en: Fuck my dad. That's what you wanna hear, right?
translation.es: A la mierda mi papá. Eso quieres oír, ¿no?

translation.en: Fine, fuck him. Fuck 'em all. Fuck the sheriff.
translation.es: A la mierda todos. El sheriff también.

translation.en: How about now?
- You're not gonna tell, right? - I said I wouldn't.
translation.es: - ¿No irás a decir nada? - Dije que no.

translation.en: 'Cause Bowl's the only guy that would get us anything.
translation.es: Bol es el único que nos conseguiría algo.

translation.en: Is his name actually Bowl?
And if your dad hauls him in or he gets spooked,
translation.es: Si tu papá lo arresta o si se asusta,

translation.en: that's the last contact we got.
He won't say anything.
- Hey, Leeza. -
- Up to no good I can tell. - Just goin' for a ride.
translation.es: - Veo que traman algo. - Estamos paseando.

translation.en: - A short trip courtesy of Bowl. - Yo. For real?
translation.es: - Un viajecito, cortesía de Bol. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: You're worried I'd narc?
I wish you could come with us.
I'm good. I actually prefer not to smell like cat shit.
translation.es: No, gracias. Prefiero no oler a mierda de gato.

translation.en: Time for supper, Leeza.
Hey, Ms. Scarborough.
Hey there, Warren.
Come along, dear.
- Did you bring a life jacket? - What?
- A life jacket. - No. Are you serious?
Hey, if we flip, don't get your foot under the seat. You'll drown.
translation.es: Si nos damos vuelta, no pongas el pie bajo el asiento. Te ahogarás.

translation.en: It's an awful way to go.
This is a thing we've been doin' for generations, man,
so you fuck this up and tell your dad…
translation.es: Si la cagas y le cuentas a tu papá…

translation.en: - It's gonna be bad for you, man. - I'm not gonna tell my dad. Come on.
translation.es: - Será malo para ti. - No voy a contarle. Vamos.

translation.en: I patched it, so no more leaks. I think.
- You got a flashlight? - Oh, yeah. I got that.
- You guys see that? - What?
Like a heron, or a monster pelican. It flew right over us.
translation.es: Una garza o un pelícano enorme. Voló sobre nosotros.

translation.en: It was huge. I saw the wingspan.
translation.es: Era grandísimo. Le vi la envergadura.

translation.en: Somebody's gotta do something about these strays.
translation.es: Hay que hacer algo con estos gatos.

translation.en: It didn't used to be this bad, but it's an army now.
translation.es: Antes no eran tantos. Ahora son un ejército.

translation.en: My dad says they're all from the mainland?
translation.es: Mi papá dice que son de tierra firme.

translation.en: Yeah. Technically, they have to be.
I mean, I don't know when people brought cats up here,
translation.es: No sé cuándo trajeron gatos aquí,

translation.en: but they definitely brought more than one.
I can't believe there's enough for them to eat.
Well, we know what they're eating.
When people actually lived up here, they'd bury their dead in their yards,
translation.es: Cuando aquí vivía gente, enterraban a sus muertos en sus patios,

translation.en: up until the '20s, my dad says.
translation.es: hasta los años veinte, dice mi papá.

translation.en: You know, sometimes there's a storm,
and it floods and those bodies just pop up right out the ground. Cat food.
translation.es: todo se inunda, y los cuerpos aparecen. Comida para gatos.

translation.en: You know, those bodies are hundreds of years old and just bones.
translation.es: Esos cuerpos tienen cientos de años. Son solo huesos.

translation.en: And when it storms, they wash up on the west bank by my house.
translation.es: Y cuando hay tormenta, aparecen en la orilla occidental junto a mi casa.

translation.en: And I know, because everything from the Uppards
translation.es: Todo lo que viene de Uppards

translation.en: washes up on the west bank, and I gotta clean it up, moron.
translation.es: llega a la orilla occidental, y yo tengo que limpiar, idiota.

translation.en: - What is this? - Take it.
Uh, no, thanks.
- You don't drink? - Not that one.
Usually, we just come up here, smoke a joint.
translation.es: En general, venimos aquí a fumar porros.

translation.en: He starts pining after roller girl.
translation.es: Y él extraña a la chica rodante.

translation.en: Hey, no disrespect. It sucks being stuck in that chair.
translation.es: Con todo respeto. Es una porquería estar en esa silla.

translation.en: Hello, kitties.
You know, my brother Bobby, and Warren's brother too,
translation.es: Mi hermano Bobby y el hermano de Warren

translation.en: used to tell us that the Uppards was haunted.
- Ghost of a dead fisherman. - Yeah, Harpoon Harry.
translation.es: - Fantasmas de pescadores muertos. - Sí, Harry Arpón.

translation.en: - Harpoon Harry. -
Yeah, he harpooned kids for their meat.
translation.es: Sí, arponeaba a chicos para comer.

translation.en: It's all bullshit though,
so we wouldn't follow them when they came here to drink.
translation.es: para que no los siguiéramos mientras bebían.

translation.en: I mean, we didn't.
I did. Once.
I followed Bobby up here before he went to college.
translation.es: Seguí a Bobby antes de que se fuera.

translation.en: The only scary thing I saw was him fucking Heather Delman.
translation.es: Solo me dio miedo verlo cogiéndose a Heather Delman.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Yup.
Shit, they're fighting. Nope.
They're fucking.
Bobby sounded just like that.
- - Shit!
Warren? What the fuck?
I thought I saw something.
I guess it was Harpoon Harry, cometh at last! Ah!
Yo, stop.
Oh, man. I laid in cat shit.
translation.es: Me apoyé sobre mierda de gato.

translation.en: Thank God. Thank God. Thank God.
Oh, my boy. Home, where you belong.
translation.es: Mi niño. En casa, donde perteneces.

translation.en: Oh. Let's get you fed. You gotta eat.
Uh, just you? Where's Dad? And Warren?
translation.es: ¿Solo estás tú? ¿Dónde están papá y Warren?

translation.en: Well, you know, they're on the boat.
He just can't miss a shift. Not a single one.
translation.es: No puede faltar. Ni una vez.

translation.en: We can't afford it. But let's get you home.
translation.es: No podemos darnos ese lujo. Vamos a casa.

translation.en: - Excuse me, Sturge. - Mornin', Miss Keane.
translation.es: - Disculpe, Sturge. - Buen día, señorita Keane.

translation.en: Monsignor Pruitt was supposed to be on board. Did you see him?
translation.es: El monseñor Pruitt debía estar a bordo. ¿Lo vio?

translation.en: Nope. Uh, maybe he's gonna catch the Belle later on this afternoon.
translation.es: No, quizá tomará el Belle más tarde.

translation.en: No, he said the Breeze.
We agreed before he left. You didn't see him?
He's not easy to miss, Sturge.
Yeah, well, you're right.
Maybe I just, uh, lost him in the crowd.
translation.es: Quizá lo perdí en la multitud.

translation.en: Okay, here we go.
Hi there.
And that's the--
The spine, and it's perfect.
And that's the little foot, and it's kicking a little bit.
translation.es: Y ese es el piececito. Patea un poco.

translation.en: Let me measure your foot.
Okay, baby.
Hi, Littlefoot.
Everything is exactly where I want it to be at 20 weeks.
translation.es: Está exactamente como debe estar a las 20 semanas.

translation.en: - Have you had any spotting recently? - No.
Why?
- There's a little bleed in there. - Oh, God.
translation.es: - Hay un poco de sangre. - Dios.

translation.en: I'm not worried about it. It's very small. We'll keep an eye on it.
translation.es: No me preocupa. Es menor. Estaremos pendientes.

translation.en: I guess he's home.
Poor woman.
Peggy? Is that you, Peg?
- Oh, my God, Ma. What are you doing? - Peggy.
No, Ma. That's Erin. Peggy's daughter, Erin Greene.
translation.es: No, mamá. Es Erin. La hija de Peggy, Erin Greene.

translation.en: - Do you remember Erin Greene? - Hi, Mrs. Gunning.
I think you've put me in the wrong room.
translation.es: Creo que me pusiste en el cuarto equivocado.

translation.en: My room is upstairs.
No, Ma. No more stairs. Not for a year now.
translation.es: No, mamá. Sin escaleras. Desde hace un año.

translation.en: Not since you broke your hip.
Hey. Good boy.
- Morning, Sheriff. - Hey. Morning, Annie.
translation.es: - Buen día, sheriff. - Buen día, Annie.

translation.en: I'll be in a little later this morning. I switched my shift.
translation.es: Llegaré más tarde hoy. Cambié mi turno.

translation.en: Oh. Take your time. Yeah, this must be your son. Riley, is it?
translation.es: Tómese su tiempo. Él debe ser su hijo. Riley, ¿no?

translation.en: - Rise and shine, Joe. - Oh, shit.
- - You want some coffee?
- What did you do to me, Sharif? - Sheriff.
I'm surprised you're surprised. I figured this is where you wanted to be.
translation.es: Me sorprende tu sorpresa. Creí que querías estar aquí.

translation.en: You were trying to break in, after all.
Well, into the general store anyway.
Half past midnight and sweating pure Jim Beam.
translation.es: Pasada la medianoche y oliendo a whisky.

translation.en: Havin' at the windows with an oar.
We'd still be sweepin' up glass if your aim had been any good.
translation.es: Aún estaríamos sacando vidrio si hubieras tenido puntería.

translation.en: So you lock me up?
Well, Joe, I learned early there's no point trying to stop you drinking.
translation.es: Joe, aprendí que es inútil intentar que dejes de beber.

translation.en: Yeah, easy for you to say. Allah doesn't let you drink.
translation.es: Para ti es fácil decirlo. Allah no te deja beber.

translation.en: You said you were being followed by a giant albatross.
translation.es: Dijiste que te seguía un albatros gigante.

translation.en: - Huh? - Oh, yeah.  Wings as big as lawn chairs, you said.
translation.es: Sí. Con alas tan grandes como sillas plegables, dijiste.

translation.en: Well… that makes a little sense, actually, because albatross is bad luck.
translation.es: Bueno, tiene sentido. Los albatros traen mala suerte.

translation.en: You'd know that if you was a fisherman.
Easy, big fella. Easy. Hello.
Snapped at me. Snapped right at me, just passing by.
translation.es: Me lanzó una dentellada mientras estaba pasando.

translation.en: Pike didn't snap.
Barks sometimes. Mostly just to say hello.
He's just big is all. He just sounds bigger than he means to.
translation.es: Es grande, suena más grande de lo que quiere.

translation.en: Snapped. Thought he might have a go at my hand if I reached out.
translation.es: Me lanzó una dentellada. Habría podido morderme la mano.

translation.en: I'm telling you, Sheriff, it's a menace.
I'm sorry, Miss Keane. He's just waiting for his dad.
translation.es: Lo lamento, señorita Keane. Esperaba a su papá.

translation.en: Speaking of a menace.
Hey, what's that, Beverly? You wanna speak up?
Yeah, you just ignore her, buddy. She's just mean. She's just a meanie.
translation.es: Ignórala, amigo. Es malvada, eso es todo.

translation.en: I'm sorry for the hassle. I mean it.
Can't be what you pictured when you took this job,
translation.es: No lo habrás imaginado al aceptar el puesto,

translation.en: dealing with me all the time.
Ah, it might bother me if I gave you much thought.
Come on, buddy.
Later, Sharif.
Take care, Joe.
See you soon.
Yeah, the Millers went last year.
translation.es: Sí, los Miller se fueron el año pasado.

translation.en: They didn't even list.
I don't think anyone's trying to sell anymore. They just left.
translation.es: Ya nadie intenta vender. Simplemente se fueron.

translation.en: Frank's got a job in Oregon now.
Factory job.
Oh. Welcome home, honey. Welcome home.
You comin'?
Sorry. Your dad's been using this to store some stuff in.
translation.es: Disculpa. Tu papá estuvo usándolo como depósito.

translation.en: Don't have room for it anywhere else. Sorry.
translation.es: No tiene espacio en ninguna otra parte. Lo lamento.

translation.en: - He really didn't show up. - Don't look at it like that.
translation.es: - No se dignó a venir. - No lo veas así.

translation.en: You're home now. He's treatin' you normal. That's all.
translation.es: Estás en casa ahora. Él te trata normalmente. Eso es todo.

translation.en: You don't know what it's like these days.
translation.es: No sabes cómo es hoy en día.

translation.en: You can only fish certain spots, certain days, crab certain spots,
translation.es: Puedes pescar solo en ciertos lugares y en ciertos días

translation.en: since the spill.
Three years since the spill, yeah, which was bad enough.
translation.es: Pasaron tres años desde el derrame, que fue terrible.

translation.en: God only knows. I mean, you couldn't eat anything out of that water.
translation.es: Dios es testigo. No podías comer nada de esas aguas.

translation.en: Your father smelled like diesel every day he came home,
translation.es: Tu padre olía a diésel todos los días al volver a casa,

translation.en: even after they said it was all cleaned up.
translation.es: incluso después de que limpiaran todo.

translation.en: I mean, I thought the environmentalists were on our side.
translation.es: Yo creí que los ambientalistas estaban de nuestro lado.

translation.en: These limits, these retention limits, going on about population decline,
translation.es: Estos límites de retención. Por la reducción de las poblaciones,

translation.en: and suddenly, there's a limit.
But not for the oil company, for us. For the boats.
translation.es: No para la petrolera, para nosotros, los pesqueros.

translation.en: We can only catch as much as they say?
translation.es: ¿Solo podemos pescar lo que ellos dicen?

translation.en: But they've never been watermen. Never worked these waters.
translation.es: Ellos nunca fueron marinos. Nunca trabajaron en estas aguas.

translation.en: I mean, you want to talk population decline,
translation.es: Para hablar de la reducción poblacional,

translation.en: let's talk about the people.
The people on this island, we used to be hundreds.
translation.es: La gente en esta isla. Éramos cientos.

translation.en: Now we're just dozens.
This isn't a community anymore, honey.
translation.es: Esto ya no es una comunidad.

translation.en: It's a ghost.
- He'd be here if he could. - Sure, Mom.
translation.es: - Él estaría aquí si pudiera. - Claro, mamá.

translation.en: I figured this is the first time Sheriff Hassan
translation.es: Debe ser la primera vez que el sheriff Hassan

translation.en: has been with us for a storm like this,
translation.es: nos acompaña en una tormenta así.

translation.en: and I thought we could all use a refresher.
Thank you, Mayor.
Um, still looking like it'll hit us right in the face.
translation.es: Parece que nos pegará de lleno.

translation.en: Weather services are calling it a major storm,
forecasting to have the worst of it landing tomorrow night.
translation.es: La peor parte llegará mañana a la noche.

translation.en: Assuming it does hit and hits like they say,
the biggest thing I wanted to talk about was our fuel supply.
translation.es: quería hablar de la reserva de combustible.

translation.en: Sturge?
Yeah, I'll make sure the pumps are off, as usual.
Uh, just before sundown so that the, uh, watermen can fuel up after the catch.
translation.es: Antes del anochecer, para que los marinos puedan cargar después de la pesca.

translation.en: And I'm assuming you'll cut the power to the marina?
- Oh, we'll likely lose power anyways. - Oh, yeah.
Then I'm thinking we make the classrooms available here for shelters if we need.
translation.es: Las aulas podrán usarse como refugios si lo necesitamos. Podríamos…

translation.en: - We could always-- - I'm sorry.
You're new, so you wouldn't be expected to know this,
translation.es: Usted es nuevo, así que no podría saberlo.

translation.en: but St. Patrick's is always the shelter.
translation.es: El refugio es siempre San Patricio.

translation.en: We set out cots as a matter of rule, always have.
translation.es: Ponemos catres como regla, siempre lo hemos hecho.

translation.en: Now… Well, now, we have the new rec center.
translation.es: Ahora, tenemos el nuevo centro recreativo.

translation.en: It's not completely done, but close, and it holds twice as many.
translation.es: No está terminado, pero casi, y cabe el doble de gente.

translation.en: I mean, I'm not sure holding twice as many makes a material difference.
translation.es: No sé si el doble de capacidad tenga alguna importancia.

translation.en: When you do the math, you…
- Apologies, Miss Keane. I wasn't aware. - No need to apologize.
translation.es: - Disculpe, señorita. No sabía. - No necesita disculparse.

translation.en: You'd have no reason to know that.
All right, um--
Bear it in mind for yourself as well,
translation.es: Téngalo en cuenta para usted también.

translation.en: unless you plan on hopping a ferry to the mosque,
translation.es: A menos que planee tomar un ferri a la mezquita,

translation.en: you'll have to hunker down with us too.
And you'd be so welcome, of course.
Thank you.
Uh, we'll let everybody know to head to St. Patrick's if things get bad.
translation.es: Les avisaremos a todos que vayan a San Patricio si hay problemas.

translation.en: They know that.
Understood. Uh, now, let's talk boats. Securing the marina for starters.
translation.es: Entendido. Hablemos de los barcos. Primero, asegurar el puerto.

translation.en: How often do you have to go to the mainland?
translation.es: ¿Cada cuánto debes ir a tierra firme?

translation.en: Once a week.
Warren, eat your food.
Uh, it's fine. It's, um… AA meetings.
translation.es: Está bien. Es una reunión de AA.

translation.en: Part of the deal. Condition of my parole.  Warren.
translation.es: - Lo exige mi libertad condicional. - Warren.

translation.en: How was your day? How was school?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal tu día? ¿Qué tal la escuela?

translation.en: It was good. Miss Greene was mostly on about the storm.
translation.es: Estuvo bien. La señorita Greene habló sobre todo de la tormenta.

translation.en: Miss Greene? That old bird's still teaching?
Nah, the old Miss Greene died in the spring.
This is the new Miss Greene, her daughter.
translation.es: Esta es la nueva Greene, su hija.

translation.en: - Erin's back? - Mmm- hmm.
I meant to tell you about that. She's only been back a few months.
translation.es: Iba a contártelo. Volvió hace pocos meses.

translation.en: She moved into Peggy's house. Her old job too.
translation.es: Se mudó a la casa de Peggy. Y tomó su puesto.

translation.en: I don't know how long she's staying,
but it was so nice to have someone move to the island.
translation.es: pero fue bueno que alguien se mudara a la isla.

translation.en: - And a young person at that. - Um…
translation.es: Y que sea una persona joven.

translation.en: Where is she back from? What was she doing?
Mmm, I suppose you'd have to ask her.
We know one thing she was doing.
translation.es: Sabemos de una cosa que hizo.

translation.en: - Warren. - What? She told us herself.
Besides, she's starting to show,
so if it was a secret, it's not going to be for long.
translation.es: Si era un secreto, no lo será por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Whatever happened when she ran away,
translation.es: Más allá de lo que haya pasado,

translation.en: she has grown into a fine young woman and a fine teacher,
translation.es: se convirtió en una buena joven y una buena maestra,

translation.en: and we're lucky that she's back.
translation.es: y nos alegra que haya vuelto.

translation.en: Prodigal daughter. You'll see her tomorrow, in fact.
translation.es: La hija pródiga. La verás mañana.

translation.en: She sits in the starboard side, halfway back, just like her mother, every week.
translation.es: Se sienta a la derecha, por la mitad, como su madre.

translation.en: - Tomorrow? - At church.
I wasn't… planning on going to church.
translation.es: No planeaba ir a la iglesia.

translation.en: Don't be silly. Of course you are.
translation.es: No seas tonto. Por supuesto que irás.

translation.en: No, things have changed for me, Ma. I'm not… That's not me anymore.
translation.es: Las cosas cambiaron para mí, mamá. Ya no soy eso.

translation.en: Well, see, Monsignor Pruitt said, before he went on pilgrimage. He said--
translation.es: El monseñor Pruitt dijo, antes de hacer su peregrinación…

translation.en: Isn't he a little bit old to be traveling? He's gonna be 80 now.
translation.es: ¿No es un poco viejo para viajar? Debe tener 80 años.

translation.en: Mmm, well, the whole congregation pitched in.
- Two weeks in the Holy Land. - Jesus.
translation.es: - Dos semanas en la Tierra Santa. - Dios.

translation.en: He spent his whole life on the island,
translation.es: Pasó toda su vida en la isla.

translation.en: and the chance to walk in Jesus' footsteps, in his actual footsteps.
translation.es: La oportunidad de seguir los pasos de Jesús…

translation.en: - Yeah. - We thought he deserved that before--
translation.es: - Sí. - Se lo merecía antes de…

translation.en: I'm surprised they let him go, though, considering his health.
translation.es: Me sorprende que lo hayan dejado ir, dada su salud.

translation.en: You should be so lucky to be as fit as him at his age.
translation.es: Ya quisieras tener su salud a su edad.

translation.en: He's losing it.
He held up the host three times during Consecration the other day.
translation.es: Levantó la hostia tres veces en la consagración.

translation.en: - I felt ridiculous ringing the bell. - We all have our moments.
translation.es: - Me sentí ridículo con la campana. - Nadie es perfecto.

translation.en: People have been seeing him wandering around at night,
translation.es: La gente lo vio deambular durante la noche.

translation.en: like late at night.
Like, midnight. At the marina, the docks, the general store.
translation.es: A medianoche. En el puerto, en el muelle, en el almacén.

translation.en: Did you see him, Warren? Do you know it was him?
translation.es: ¿Tú lo viste, Warren? ¿Sabes si era él?

translation.en: No, I'm sure it was some other 80- year- old man
translation.es: Debió ser otro hombre de 80 años

translation.en: wearing a fedora and the long coat he always wears.
translation.es: con el sombrero y el abrigo que usa él.

translation.en: Even if he was getting a little bit scattered,
translation.es: Incluso si se volvió un poco disperso,

translation.en: he belongs here on the island with us.
translation.es: su lugar es esta isla con nosotros.

translation.en: Not in some home, put out to pasture by the archdiocese.
translation.es: No un hogar de ancianos donde lo jubile la archidiócesis.

translation.en: Who knows who they'd send in his place?
So if we do cover for him, just a little--
translation.es: Si lo cubrimos, solo un poco…

translation.en: We're practically steering him around the altar half the time.
translation.es: Pasamos mucho tiempo guiándolo por el altar.

translation.en: That is not true.
Come on. You can't fool the altar boys.
translation.es: Vamos. No puedes engañar a los monaguillos.

translation.en: - You a thurifer? - That's right.
I never had any ambitions past acolyte myself.
translation.es: Nunca tuve más ambiciones que ser acólito.

translation.en: No one likes a downwardly mobile altar boy.
translation.es: Un monaguillo que desciende socialmente no gusta.

translation.en: I was really only in it for the chicks. - - You know, man in uniform.
translation.es: Solo lo hacía por las chicas. Ya sabes, un hombre con uniforme.

translation.en: It's not funny.
It's not funny at all.
You're gonna sit here at this table, after what you…
translation.es: Te sientas en esta mesa después de…

translation.en: After what you've done,
and say, Oh, church isn't for me?
translation.es: y ¿dices: La iglesia no es para mí?

translation.en: And make jokes about altar boys and Monsignor Pruitt?
translation.es: ¿Y haces chistes sobre monaguillos y el monseñor Pruitt?

translation.en: Mmm- mmm. No. Nope.
You are going to church tomorrow, Riley.
- Dad-- - And every other Sunday.
I don't care if your heart's not in it or the mood doesn't strike you.
translation.es: No me importa si ya no lo sientes o no estás de ánimo.

translation.en: You can consider it a condition of your parole.
Monsignor!
Monsignor!
Monsignor, you are home. Welcome back.
translation.es: Monseñor, está en casa. Bienvenido de vuelta.

translation.en: I'm so relieved you're okay. I waited for you this morning.
translation.es: Me alivia mucho que esté bien. Lo esperé esta mañana.

translation.en: You weren't on the Breeze like we agreed.
translation.es: No estaba en el Breeze como habíamos acordado.

translation.en: I'm sure you just forgot, had one of your…
translation.es: Lo habrá olvidado, habrá tenido una de sus…

translation.en: Still, you have no idea how it makes me look,
translation.es: No sabe la imagen que doy,

translation.en: standing there on the dock like some jilted prom date.
translation.es: parada en el muelle como una chica a la que la dejaron plantada.

translation.en: And, oh, you won't believe that new sheriff.
translation.es: Y no creerá lo que es este nuevo sheriff.

translation.en: Omar Sharif, or whatever.
translation.es: Omar Sharif, o como se llame.

translation.en: He's trying to set the school as the new storm shelter.
translation.es: Quiere que la escuela sea el nuevo refugio para tormentas.

translation.en: Y'all settled?
Yeah. I'm good.
She's been goin' to St. Patrick's every day since the accident.
translation.es: Ella estuvo yendo a San Patricio todos los días desde el accidente.

translation.en: Even if there weren't a mass, she'd go, say a rosary for you.
translation.es: Aunque no hubiera misa, iba y rezaba el rosario por ti.

translation.en: - Every day. - I'll…
I'll apologize to her, Dad.
Mom caught me up.
I'm sorry things have been so hard since the spill.
translation.es: Lamento que todo se complicara desde el derrame.

translation.en: So church isn't for you, huh?
translation.es: ¿La iglesia no es para ti, entonces?

translation.en: No, it's not for me.
You should sit back then, during Communion. That's proper.
translation.es: Entonces, siéntate atrás durante la comunión. Es lo apropiado.

translation.en: Assuming you haven't been to confession, and I'm assuming you haven't.
translation.es: Suponiendo que no has estado confesándote. Yo supongo que no.

translation.en: That'll upset your mother,
translation.es: Eso le disgustará a tu madre,

translation.en: you not taking the sacrament, but…
wouldn't be respectful if you did.
Okay.
Okay.
Good night.
Okay.
- No phone. - Okay, okay.
I don't wanna hear you texting.
I can hear you texting.
The sheriff can hear everything.
All right, Dad.
Kiss your mother.
- Good night, young man. - Night, old man.
Just ten minutes, then the phone goes off!
Don't be scared, Mom. It's just me.
translation.es: No tengas miedo, mamá. Soy yo.

translation.en: My room.
- Take a step. One step down. -
translation.es: Da un paso. Un paso abajo.

translation.en: Red sky at night, sailor's delight.
translation.es: Cielo rojo por la noche, señal de buen tiempo.

translation.en: Red sky in the morning…
- Sailor take warning. - That's right.
translation.es: - Señal de mal tiempo. - Eso es.

translation.en: It took us less than an hour with the boat.
translation.es: Nos tomó menos de una hora con el barco.

translation.en: I bet the storm's not as bad as they say. It feels like they never really are.
translation.es: La tormenta no debe ser tan fuerte. Es como si nunca lo fueran.

translation.en: My dad didn't board the windows,
translation.es: Mi papá no entabló las ventanas.

translation.en: and he basically invented overreacting, so that should tell you something.
translation.es: Es un maestro de la exageración. Eso debería decirte algo.

translation.en: - You wanna fill the cruets? - Yeah.
Somebody already did.
- Morning, everyone. -
Today is the seventh Sunday of Ordinary Time.
translation.es: Hoy es el séptimo domingo del Tiempo Ordinario.

translation.en: Our opening hymn is Faith of Our Fathers,
translation.es: Empezamos con La fe de nuestros padres,

translation.en: number 787 in your red hymnal.
translation.es: el himno número 787 en su himnario rojo.

translation.en: Who's that?
Good morning.
I know I'm not who you expected to see this morning.
translation.es: Sé que no soy quien esperaban ver esta mañana.

translation.en: I'm Father Paul Hill,
and I was sent by the diocese to fill in for Monsignor Pruitt for a few weeks.
translation.es: Me envió la diócesis para reemplazar al monseñor Pruitt unas semanas.

translation.en: He fell ill, I'm afraid, on his trip. - He's fine. -
translation.es: Él enfermó en su viaje. Se encuentra bien.

translation.en: He's recovering in a hospital on the mainland.
translation.es: Está recuperándose en un hospital en tierra firme.

translation.en: He's better off off- island,
translation.es: Está mejor fuera de la isla.

translation.en: and, well, his condition was noticed by some others on his trips, so…
translation.es: Otros notaron su estado en su viaje…

translation.en: The diocese has asked me to step in until he is up and about again,
translation.es: La diócesis me pidió que viniera hasta que él se recupere,

translation.en: but I assure you there is absolutely nothing to worry about.
translation.es: pero les aseguro que no tienen nada de que preocuparse.

translation.en: You are not losing your pastor. I can promise you that.
translation.es: No perderán a su pastor. Se los prometo.

translation.en: This is a temporary situation,
and it is my absolute pleasure to be here with you all at St. Patrick's.
translation.es: y para mí es un inmenso placer estar con ustedes aquí en San Patricio.

translation.en: Just know, I'm only here to help, and I look forward to meeting you all.
translation.es: Quiero que sepan que vengo para ayudar y estoy ansioso por conocerlos.

translation.en: In the name of the Father, and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit.
translation.es: En el nombre del Padre, del Hijo y del Espíritu Santo.

translation.en: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God,
translation.es: Que la gracia de nuestro Señor Jesucristo, el amor del Padre

translation.en: and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit, be with you all…
translation.es: y la comunión del Espíritu Santo los acompañen….

translation.en: He took bread and gave you thanks.
translation.es: Tomó el pan y les agradeció.

translation.en: He broke the bread, gave it to his disciples and said,
translation.es: Partió el pan, se lo dio a sus discípulos y dijo:

translation.en: 'Take this, all of you, and eat it.'
'This is my body, which will be given up for you.'
translation.es: Este es mi cuerpo, que será entregado por ustedes'.

translation.en: When supper was ended, he took the cup.
translation.es: Acabada la cena, tomó la copa.

translation.en: Again, he gave you thanks and praise, gave the cup to his disciples and said,
translation.es: Tras agradecerles y bendecirlos otra vez, se la dio a sus discípulos y dijo:

translation.en: 'Take this, all of you, and drink from it.'
'This is my blood, the blood of the new and everlasting covenant.'
translation.es: Esta es mi sangre, la sangre de la nueva y eterna alianza,

translation.en: 'It will be shed for you and for all so that sins may be forgiven.'
translation.es: que será derramada por ustedes para el perdón de los pecados.

translation.en: 'Do this in remembrance of me.'
- Body of Christ. - Amen.
- Body of Christ. - Amen.
Blood of Christ.
Body of Christ. Body of Christ.
Blood of Christ.
- Body of Christ. - Riley.
I'll sit down here.
- Body of Christ. -
Body of Christ. Body of Christ.
Blood of Christ, Erin Greene.
Body of Christ.
Blood of Christ.
Well, I met him last night, of course, at the rectory.
translation.es: Lo conocí anoche, claro, en la rectoría.

translation.en: We had a lot to talk about,
just catching him up on how things work around here.
translation.es: para ponerlo al día sobre cómo es todo aquí.

translation.en: Monsignor just loves him, and I can see why.
translation.es: El monseñor lo adora, y lo entiendo.

translation.en: - Leeza Scarborough! - How do you know my name?
Monsignor's told me all about you.
translation.es: El monseñor me contó todo de ti.

translation.en: He says I'll see you at daily mass, and that it may just be the two of us.
translation.es: Dijo que te vería en la misa diaria, quizá sin nadie más presente.

translation.en: Father. Wade Scarborough. My wife, Dolly.
translation.es: Padre. Wade Scarborough. Mi esposa, Dolly.

translation.en: - Such a pleasure to meet you. - Of course, Mr. Mayor, Mrs. Mayor.
translation.es: - Es un placer conocerlo. - Por supuesto, el alcalde y su señora.

translation.en: I am so sorry to surprise you like this.
The diocese was supposed to contact you directly.
Please, call me Wade.
Golly, it's such a joy to see a new face.
translation.es: Caramba, es un gran gusto ver una nueva cara.

translation.en: Welcome to the Pot, what's left of it anyway.
translation.es: Bienvenido a la Olla, lo que queda de ella.

translation.en: The Crock Pot!
Yeah, well, it's a cute nickname, yeah.
But you know, it's true. We are a melting pot, a grab bag…
translation.es: Pero es cierto, somos un crisol, una bolsa de sorpresas…

translation.en: - A piñata, even.  - Mmm.
A whole variety of different flavors
that just keeps getting pummeled with some huge awful stick.
translation.es: siempre aporreada con algún palo enorme.

translation.en: We sure are glad to add you to the stew.
- Annie Flynn, Father. - Annie Flynn.
- And this is my husband, Ed. - Ed Flynn.
translation.es: - Y él es mi esposo, Ed. - Ed Flynn.

translation.en: Father.
And I noticed you sat back for Communion.
translation.es: Usted se sentó atrás durante la comunión.

translation.en: That got rather quiet, didn't it?
My son Riley, he's--
Not exactly in a state of grace right now.
translation.es: No exactamente en estado de gracia ahora.

translation.en: Hey, look, I think that's great.
Uh, turns out I'm not much use to people who are in a state of grace.
translation.es: No estoy demasiado acostumbrado a la gente en estado de gracia.

translation.en: Jesus, uh,
he didn't really have that much interest for those kind of people, either.
translation.es: tampoco tenía mucho interés en ese tipo de gente.

translation.en: No, he seemed to go straight for those folks
translation.es: No, iba directo a aquellos que no estaban

translation.en: who weren't in a state of grace.
They were his favorite people, turns out. They were the ones he called friends.
translation.es: Era su gente favorita. Era la gente que llamaba amigos.

translation.en: Yeah, we can work with that.
Yeah, uh, welcome to the Crock Pot.
translation.es: Sí, bienvenido a la Olla de Presión.

translation.en: It was a nice surprise to hear the old translation again.
translation.es: Qué grata sorpresa oír la traducción antigua.

translation.en: - We haven't heard that in what, ten years? - Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿No la oíamos desde hace diez años? - Sí.

translation.en: Didn't know you were still doing that.
You noticed, huh? I know, the new missal is closer to the original Latin, but…
translation.es: ¿Se dio cuenta? El nuevo misal se acerca más al latín original, pero…

translation.en: Well, well, well.
It's the prodigal son.
No, I think, uh, you're the prodigal one.
- I'm just the black sheep. -
Can I walk you home?
Yeah. Let's walk.
Where were you?
In New York. Upstate New York.
translation.es: En el estado de Nueva York, al norte.

translation.en: I guessed that.
I mean, when you ran away, it was the subject of a lot of debate.
translation.es: Tu huida fue un gran tema de debate.

translation.en: A lot of people had theories and most of them were Hollywood,
translation.es: Muchos tenían teorías, la mayoría sobre Hollywood,

translation.en: but that was one of my guesses.
translation.es: pero yo pensé en Nueva York.

translation.en: Why?
Covered bridges.
- You remember that? - Mmm- hmm.
I told you that like half our lives ago.
translation.es: Te lo conté hace una eternidad.

translation.en: I didn't start there.
I went south, then I went west.
translation.es: Fui al sur, luego al oeste.

translation.en: And I was in Austin for a while. And I joined up with a rock band.
translation.es: Después estuve un tiempo en Austin. Y me uní a una banda de rock.

translation.en: You're kidding.
I was such an idiot.
- Well, I guess we both were idiots. - Hmm.
Look at us, back where we started. The one place we swore we'd never end up.
translation.es: Míranos, de vuelta donde empezamos. El lugar donde juramos nunca terminar.

translation.en: What about you?
- No rock band though. - Mmm.
Just financial stuff. Went to school, partied too much.
translation.es: Solo cosas financieras. Estudié, me divertí demasiado.

translation.en: I'm shocked.
Made a lot of money. For a bit.
translation.es: Gané mucho dinero. Por un tiempo.

translation.en: Stocks, then a startup. But then all…
translation.es: Acciones, una empresa emergente. Y luego todo…

translation.en: That all went away.
- Married? - No, no. You?
Yeah. I mean, technically, it…
But it's over. It's also a long story.
translation.es: Pero se acabó. Y es una larga historia.

translation.en: Surprised to see you in church.
translation.es: Me sorprende verte en la iglesia.

translation.en: Yeah, me too.
I would have never guessed it, but it's been good for me.
translation.es: Nunca lo habría imaginado, pero es bueno para mí.

translation.en: - I saw you sit back during Communion. -
translation.es: Te sentaste atrás durante la comunión.

translation.en: It's funny, most guys find Jesus in prison.
translation.es: Es extraño, muchos hallan a Jesús en prisión.

translation.en: Well, you always went your own way.
Yeah, that wasn't it though.
I threw away the Bible the first night. But it…
translation.es: Tiré la Biblia la primera noche,

translation.en: It wasn't instant.
I did go looking. I really did.
There's a lot of time to read in there and I read it all,
translation.es: Ahí hay mucho tiempo para leer, y leí de todo.

translation.en: Torah, Quran, Talmud, Tao Te Ching.
translation.es: La Torá, el Corán, el Talmud, el Tao Te Ching.

translation.en: Judaism, Buddhism, Islam, Jainism.
Figured if I was lookin' for God, I should look everywhere.
translation.es: Si buscaba a Dios, debía buscar en todas partes.

translation.en: Came out of that an atheist.
What?
I'm supposed to be the godless heathen, and you are the altar boy.
translation.es: Se supone que yo soy la pagana impía, y tú, el monaguillo.

translation.en: My mom wouldn't believe any of this.
And you're pregnant.
Yeah, I am.
Bet that's a story.
It is and it isn't.
Littlefoot saved my life.
Is there anything else you need this afternoon, Father?
For the storm or…
Oh. No. No, thank you, Miss Keane.
Can I ask you something?
Forgive me, I don't mean to…
It's just you're wearing a gold chasuble today.
translation.es: Es que tiene puesta una casulla dorada hoy.

translation.en: Uh, yes, I am.
Isn't that for feast days and special…
translation.es: ¿No es para días festivos y ocasiones especiales…?

translation.en: Shouldn't it be green today?
We're in Ordinary Time. It's the seventh Sunday of Ordinary Time.
translation.es: Es Tiempo Ordinario. El séptimo domingo del Tiempo Ordinario.

translation.en: No, I'm afraid I wasn't able to locate the green chasuble this morning.
translation.es: No pude encontrar la casulla verde esta mañana.

translation.en: Perhaps Monsignor Pruitt,
he stored it somewhere unusual given his mental state before he left.
translation.es: la guardó en algún lugar inusual, dado su estado mental antes de irse.

translation.en: I just figured this was better than my pajamas.
translation.es: Pensé que esto sería mejor que mi piyama.

translation.en: Honestly, I didn't expect that anyone would notice.
translation.es: Francamente, no esperaba que nadie se diera cuenta.

translation.en: Well, in the future, let me know if there's an issue.
translation.es: En el futuro, avíseme si tiene una dificultad.

translation.en: That's what I'm here for. I can order more as well.
translation.es: Para eso estoy aquí. Puedo pedir más también.

translation.en: I'm sure I'll find it. I just need some time to open up all the cabinets.
translation.es: La encontraré. Solo necesito tiempo para abrir todos los armarios.

translation.en: Of course.
This was excellent.
Have a good afternoon, Father. I'm glad you're here.
translation.es: Que tenga una buena tarde, padre. Me alegra tenerlo aquí.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
And likewise.
Must be weird, I mean, living there with her gone?
translation.es: Debe ser raro. ¿Vivir aquí sin ella?

translation.en: It's a lot better than when she was here. You at home?
translation.es: Es mucho mejor que cuando ella estaba. ¿Tú estás en tu casa?

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
That's gotta feel weird.
- Tiny room, twin bed. - Actually, I'm kinda used to that.
translation.es: - Un cuarto diminuto, cama pequeña. - Estoy acostumbrado.

translation.en: So, I mean, you came back… here.
Like, you came back here on purpose.
Why?
How are you, Riley?
Hangin' in.
No, I mean, how are you?
I don't know.
That's kinda…
That's kinda the whole thing. I don't know. I have no idea.
translation.es: Esa es la cuestión. No sé. No tengo idea.

translation.en: I mean, in prison, it was easy. I had things to do, you know.
translation.es: En la prisión, era fácil. Tenías ocupaciones, contar los días para salir, comer, dormir, leer.

translation.en: Count the days, count down the sentence, eat, sleep, read.
translation.es: Tenías ocupaciones, contar los días para salir, comer, dormir, leer.

translation.en: It's all pretty carefully spelled out for you. Regimented. But here…
translation.es: Todo está claramente demarcado y reglamentado. Pero aquí…

translation.en: Here…
I have nothing.
What, am I gonna get a job?
Go to school? I have no money, no prospects, I just…
translation.es: ¿Estudiaré? No tengo dinero ni perspectivas, solo…

translation.en: I just exist now.
That's it. I have…
absolutely no purpose at all.
I'm just sitting in my parents' house, breathing,
translation.es: En la casa de mis padres, me siento y respiro,

translation.en: and serving no purpose to anyone whatsoever. I'm just…
translation.es: sin serle de ninguna utilidad a nadie. Me limito…

translation.en: living.
And that's the worst part, because I shouldn't be alive, Erin.
translation.es: Y esa es la peor parte, porque no debería estar vivo, Erin.

translation.en: So I don't know.
What I do here.
I eat. Sleep.
Shit, I don't know.
Walk home now, eat dinner, wait out this fuckin' storm.
translation.es: Camino a casa ahora, ceno, espero a la puta tormenta.

translation.en: There you go.
Do that.
Ride out the storm tonight, and then tomorrow…
translation.es: Capea la tormenta esta noche, y luego mañana…

translation.en: you'll see what tomorrow's all about. Find another project.
translation.es: verás qué trae el mañana. Busca otro proyecto.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
For what you've been through.
I'm really, really sorry.
So it's just…
Just this one. Just the big one.
The little ones I can replace, but just this one.
translation.es: Puedo reemplazar las pequeñas. Solo esta.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
- What's happening? - Mom, it's okay.
I swear he's out there, just walking on the beach.
translation.es: Estaba ahí afuera, caminando en la playa.

translation.en: What? No, he's on the mainland.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No, él está en tierra firme.

translation.en: Okay, maybe he came back,
and he wandered out, having one of those spells.
translation.es: Quizá salió a deambular, en uno de sus delirios.

translation.en: - I'm not seeing anything. - I don't see him.
translation.es: - No veo nada. - No lo veo.

translation.en: No, I swear, it's the hat, the coat. I know the outfit, and it's him.
translation.es: Lo juro. El sombrero, el abrigo. Conozco su atuendo. Es él.

translation.en: No, he's on the mainland.
It's Pruitt!
Honey, my eyes aren't what they used to be, so I can't…
translation.es: Cariño, no veo como antes, no puedo…

translation.en: Father Pruitt!
Monsignor!
Monsignor! Monsignor!
Father!
The phones are still down.
We should just walk to the rectory and settle this.
translation.es: Vayamos a la rectoría y resolvamos esto.

translation.en: Make sure he's okay.
I have to check on the boat anyway.
translation.es: Igual tengo que revisar el barco.

translation.en: Dad. What is that?
